channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 尽管中国市场低迷，保时捷仍增加 2023 年交付量
item.description: Luxury carmaker Porsche increased its deliveries by 3% in 2023, with 320,221 vehicles delivered worldwide, as growth in Europe and North America offset a challenging market in China, the company said on Friday.翻译:豪华汽车制造商保时捷周五表示，由于欧洲和北美的增长抵消了中国市场的挑战，2023 年全球交付量增加了 3%，达到 320,221 辆。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国媒体警告不要将中国印度洋研究视为威胁
item.description: Chinese state media warned on Friday that a report by a prominent U.S. think tank on the military uses of Chinese scientific research across the Indian Ocean gave "ammunition" to countries bent on concocting threats from China.翻译:中国官方媒体周五警告说，美国一家著名智库发布的一份关于中国科研成果在印度洋的军事用途的报告，为那些一心炮制中国威胁的国家提供了“弹药”。
item.author: Greg Torode

item.title: 2023年中俄贸易额创历史新高2400亿美元——中国海关
item.description: China's 2023 two-way trade with Russia hit $240 billion, setting yet another new record, Chinese customs data showed on Friday, as the two countries pushed for closer economic ties even as the war in Ukraine raged on.翻译:中国海关周五公布的数据显示，2023年中国与俄罗斯的双向贸易额达到2400亿美元，再创新高，尽管乌克兰战争仍在继续，但两国仍在推动更紧密的经济联系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 因非洲猪瘟，中国解除对比利时生猪及猪肉产品的五年禁令
item.description: China's customs on Friday lifted a five-year ban on pig and pork products from Belgium that was implemented because of an outbreak of African swine fever in 2018.翻译:中国海关周五解除了因2018年爆发非洲猪瘟而对比利时生猪及猪肉产品实施的为期五年的禁令。
item.author: Mei Mei Chu

item.title: 台湾各党派将在关键选举中最后争取支持
item.description: Taiwan's three main political parties will hold mass rallies on Friday evening in a final push for support ahead of critical presidential and parliamentary elections happening against a backdrop of increased Chinese pressure on the island.翻译:台湾三大政党将于周五晚上举行大规模集会，在中国对台湾施压不断加大的背景下，在关键的总统和议会选举之前最后争取支持。
item.author: Zahra Matarani, Joseph Campbell

item.title: 虽然还处于早期阶段，但“轻松而快乐”的拉杜卡努看到了重回巅峰的道路
item.description: Emma Raducanu cautions that her comeback is in its early stages heading into the Australian Open but feels she has finally shed some of the mental baggage of her fairytale Grand Slam triumph at Flushing Meadows.翻译:艾玛·拉杜卡努警告说，她的复出还处于澳大利亚网球公开赛的早期阶段，但她觉得自己终于摆脱了法拉盛草地童话般的大满贯胜利的一些精神包袱。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国出口增长，但通货紧缩持续，经济迈入2024年基础不稳
item.description: More policy support seen as economy still fragile.翻译:经济仍脆弱，政策支持力度加大。
item.author: Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao

item.title: 布林肯将在台湾选举前会见中国高级官员
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions.翻译:美国国务院在其官方日程中表示，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯将于周五在华盛顿会见中国高级官员刘建超，此次会谈将在台湾选举前一天进行，此次选举将考验缓解美中紧张局势的努力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾称投票前一天在海峡上空发现更多中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month.翻译:台湾国防部周五表示，在过去 24 小时内发现了 5 个中国气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越了台湾岛，这是台湾国防部表示在过去一个月发现的一系列此类气球中的最新一个。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉降低部分新款中国 Model 3 和 Model Y 汽车的价格
item.description: The price of Tesla's new China Model 3 dropped to 245,900 yuan, and the price of the Model Y dropped to 258,900 yuan, as of Jan. 12, according to the company's website.翻译:据该公司网站显示，截至1月12日，特斯拉国产新款Model 3售价降至24.59万元，Model Y售价降至25.89万元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 部长们表示，中国和加拿大将就“困难”关系保持接触
item.description: China and Canada want to maintain contacts to bolster what Beijing called the "current difficult situation" in bilateral relations, the two governments said after talks between their foreign ministers.翻译:两国外长会谈后两国政府表示，中国和加拿大希望保持接触，以加强北京所称的双边关系“当前困难局面”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管有哥谭市的报道，Grifols 仍预计中国股权出售仍在继续
item.description: Grifols told investors on Thursday it did not foresee any problem closing its $1.8 billion sale of a stake in Shanghai RAAS, despite a slump in its shares after a Gotham City Research report this week querying the Spanish drugmaker's accounting.翻译:Grifols 周四告诉投资者，尽管本周 Gotham City Research 的一份报告质疑这家西班牙制药商的会计报告，该公司股价暴跌，但预计以 18 亿美元出售上海莱士股份的交易不会出现任何问题。
item.author: Joan Faus, Nell Mackenzie

item.title: 中国就芯片制造出口管制和制裁向美国提出担忧
item.description: China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao expressed concern over U.S. curbs preventing third countries from exporting lithography machines to China during a phone call with U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo on Thursday, his ministry said.翻译:中国商务部表示，中国商务部部长王文涛周四在与美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多的电话中对美国阻止第三国向中国出口光刻机的限制措施表示担忧。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 德国外长在菲律宾谴责中国在南海的“冒险举动”
item.description: Germany's foreign minister criticised the Chinese coastguard's activities in the South China Sea, including its use of lasers and water cannon, during a visit on Thursday to the Philippines, saying the actions were causing concern in Europe too.翻译:德国外交部长在周四访问菲律宾期间批评了中国海警在南海的活动，包括使用激光和高压水枪，称这些行为也引起了欧洲的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国海警船进入东海争议海域
item.description: The Chinese coastguard said it patrolled the territorial waters of the Diaoyu Islands on Thursday to conduct "right protection".翻译:中国海警表示，周四在钓鱼岛领海进行巡逻，进行“维权”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 韩国前总理将在四月大选前组建新政党
item.description: A former South Korean prime minister announced on Thursday his plan to launch a new political party in a move that aims to challenge the domination of the two leading parties in parliament in the run-up to an election on April 10.翻译:韩国前总理周四宣布，他计划成立一个新政党，此举旨在在 4 月 10 日选举前挑战议会中两个主要政党的统治地位。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 印度大力修建桥梁、公路和铁路，孟买焕然一新
item.description: India's longest bridge, the 22-km (14-mile) Atal Setu linking central Mumbai with a fast-growing commercial hub across the Arabian Sea, will open on Friday in a ceremony by Prime Minister Narenda Modi as a centrepiece of his government's infrastructure drive.翻译:印度最长的桥梁，全长 22 公里（14 英里）的 Atal Setu 大桥将孟买市中心与阿拉伯海对面快速发展的商业中心连接起来，将于周五在纳伦达·莫迪总理的仪式上举行通车仪式，作为政府基础设施建设的核心项目。
item.author: Shilpa Jamkhandikar, Ira Dugal

item.title: FACTBOX 台湾选举如何进行？
item.description: Taiwan holds presidential and parliamentary elections on Saturday, which will be watched closely by neighbour China as it views the island as a Chinese province. Taiwan's government rejects Beijing's sovereignty claims.翻译:台湾将于周六举行总统和议会选举，邻国中国将密切关注此次选举，因为中国将台湾视为中国的一个省。台湾政府拒绝北京的主权主张。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：SK On 高管称可能于 2026 年开始为汽车制造商量产 LFP 电池
item.description: South Korea's SK On plans to start mass producing lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries as early as 2026 to supply several automakers as it pushes to deliver a lower cost battery chemistry favoured by its Chinese rivals, a senior executive said.翻译:韩国 SK On 的一位高管表示，该公司计划最早于 2026 年开始大规模生产磷酸铁锂 (LFP) 电池，为多家汽车制造商供货，该公司正在努力提供受中国竞争对手青睐的低成本电池化学材料。
item.author: Abhirup Roy, Heekyong Yang

item.title: 优衣库母公司迅销公司第一季度利润因海外销售强劲而飙升
item.description: Japan's Fast Retailing Co , owner of clothing brand Uniqlo, posted a 25% jump in first quarter operating profit on Thursday fuelled by strong overseas sales as it charts a third-straight year of record earnings.翻译:服装品牌优衣库的所有者日本迅销公司周四公布，在强劲的海外销售推动下，第一季度营业利润增长了 25%，连续第三年创下盈利纪录。
item.author: Reuters
